text.section: The Trust shall meet at least twice a year or as necessary as determined by the Trust.

A voting and nonvoting member of the Trust:
may not receive compensation; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

The Trust may:
adopt bylaws for the regulation of its affairs and the conduct of its business; and
appoint committees to carry out the purposes of the Trust.
